articles.title: From opening tip with ‘Roundball Rock’ on, NBA return to NBC off to a good start
articles.description:
The network hit almost all of the right nostalgic notes before and during its debut broadcast, a double-overtime thriller between the Thunder and Rockets.

The post From opening tip with ‘Roundball Rock’ on, NBA return to NBC off to a good start appeared first on Boston.com.
